pages.text: $(italic)In a painting you have seen a fantastic creature that seems to be made of Soul Sand and Wither Skeleton Skulls. For hours you lay in wait in a Nether Fortress, only to return with modest loot.$(br2)Who knows... maybe there are even more trophies to snatch? You just need a sharp enough weapon.

But then there were the Creepers! Once struck by lightning, they charge so strongly that their explosion blows the heads of his opponents (in the worst case, yourself) right off his head. This effect must be imitable in the form of an enchantment, you thought. And so $(l:enchantments/treature_hunter)Treasure Hunter$(l) was born.
